subject: Coaches and Managers
Blood Clots
Football
lead_paragraph: The Michigan State coach Mark Dantonio is back in the hospital because of a blood clot in his leg, causing him to miss the 24th-ranked Spartans’ game against No. 11 Wisconsin.
snippet: The Michigan State coach Mark Dantonio is back in the hospital because of a blood clot in his leg, causing him to miss the 24th-ranked Spartans’ game against No. 11 Wisconsin.
